overview: Based on the famous novel "Sangre y arena" by Spanish writer Blasco Ibáñez, this high budget production stars Sunset Thomas and Rocco Siffredi in the 35mm release that won the 1997 AVN "Best European Film" award. "Torero" sets a new standard in adult films, with full sets and costuming, a plot, gorgeous young women, exotic settings, luxury villas, bullfighting, original music score and excellent production techniques combined with elements of tragedy, courage and love.
title: Torero
